name: Spotřebitelské fórum
goal: We are an open non-profit platform promoting the communication between the public, civil society organisations, companies and the state. We connect organisations and companies active in the domestic market with the purpose of protecting the interests of Czech consumers, in particular, in areas such as retail, sharing economy, e-commerce, real estate and financial services.
euInitiatives: Protection of consumers; sharing economy from the perspective of consumers; financial services from the perspective of consumers; transportation from the perspective of consumers; IT services from the perspective of consumers; Different content of goods in Western part and Eastern part of the EU; Class Actions.
